text: Atlético de San Luis Femenil is a Mexican women's football club based in San Luis Potosí. The club has been the female section of Atlético San Luis since 2019. The team was founded for 2019–20 Liga MX Femenil season, after the promotion of the men's section to Liga MX, because the division requires participating teams to have a Women's squad to be part of the competition. ==Personnel== ===Coaching staff=== {|class="wikitable |- ! style=background- color:red;color:#FFFFFF| Position ! style=background-color:red;color:#FFFFFF| Staff |- |- |Manager | Rigoberto Esparza |- |Assistant manager|| Francisco Bravo |- |Fitness coach|| Ángel Soto |- |Physiotherapist|| Astrid Velásquez |- | rowspan="2"|Team doctors | Marco Vite |- | Alejandra Alfaro |} ==Players== ===Current squad=== ==References== Category:Sport in San Luis Potosí City Category:Football clubs in San Luis Potosí Category:Association football clubs established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Mexico Category:Women's association football clubs in Mexico
title: Atlético San Luis (women)
